channel.title: Port forwarding help
channel.description: im wondering if i use pfconfig wich you get from portforward.com rather than logging into your router and doing it

item.title: Port forwarding help
item.dc:creator: @_8ballcrazy ~8ballcrazy~
item.description:
@_8ballcrazy wrote:

ooooo that sucks lol,i usually just have my server online at night cause thats when my dad isnt on xbox live so i just unplug my router and then use my cable modem,but that sucks,i really cant help you on port forwarding cause ive tried it on my modem but it isnt listed in the router list

item.title: Port forwarding help
item.dc:creator: @_8ballcrazy ~8ballcrazy~
item.description:
@_8ballcrazy wrote:

dont you have a router and modem that your internet provider gives you?[br][size=1]Posted on: August 18, 2007, 08:27:45 PM[/size][hr]cause me i got internet provider called “comcast” they give me a comcast modem and all i do is have a plug go into that modem and into the comp and thats all you need,i use my router to plug into multiple things at once like a laptop and xbox

Read full topic
